items.name: func NSEqualSizes(NSSize, NSSize) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether two size values are equal.

items.name: func NSMakeSize(CGFloat, CGFloat) -> NSSize
items.desc: Returns a new NSSize from the specified values.

items.name: func NSSizeFromString(String) -> NSSize
items.desc: Returns an NSSize from a text-based representation.

items.name: func NSStringFromSize(NSSize) -> String
items.desc: Returns a string representation of a size.

items.name: func NSSizeFromCGSize(CGSize) -> NSSize
items.desc: Returns an NSSize typecast from a CGSize.

items.name: func NSSizeToCGSize(NSSize) -> CGSize
items.desc: Returns a CGSize typecast from an NSSize.

items.name: let NSZeroSize: NSSize
items.desc: An NSSize structure set to 0 in both dimensions.

items.name: typealias NSSizeArray
items.desc: Type indicating a parameter is an array of NSSize structures.

items.name: typealias NSSizePointer
items.desc: Type indicating parameter is a pointer to an NSSize structure.
